transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ha sir, hello.
Customer: Aa rahi hai aawaz?
Executive: Ha sir aa rahi hai ab.
Customer: Sir aapne ek concern bheji hui hai, usi hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji ji aawaz aa rahi hai. ke regarding.
Executive: Ha sir voice break ho rahi hai aapki.
Customer: Aaj to bhai aaj to bariyamu chala raha hu abhi to network ki problem hai yaha pe.
Executive: Achha achha sir. Sir aapne ek concern bheji hui hai, subscription ke regarding hamare paas ticket aayi hui hai uski to sir kya concern thi aap hame bataiyega ek baar?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Aapne ek concern bheji hui hai ticket ke regarding.
Customer: Ye dekho aayi hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Are keh rahe the ki mam aap IndiaMART se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ha ha mai IndiaMART se hi baat kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Account manager?
Executive: Ha account manager aapki baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Mai ye kehna chah raha tha ye tere bare me kyun nahi aa rahi hai mai aaj bhi dekha tha to local ka kuch kaam hi nahi aa raha hai kya baat hai?
Executive: Sir aap use kab se karna band kar diye ho ye bata do mujhe kitna din use kiye ho 90 days ke andar me?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Aap aap daily basis pe use kar rahe ho IndiaMART wala apna?
Customer: Nahi ji daily kar raha hu daily aapko mai iske screenshot bhi aapko bhej diya karunga aap bataiye aapko ye lagta hai dekhte nahi aapko screenshot daily bhej diya karunga latest.
Executive: Sir ek minute mai check kar leti hu sir kya dikkat aa rahi hai. Ek minute dijiye.
Customer: Sir kya dikkat aa rahi hai bylist se related dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Violet aayenge tabhi to hum usko consume karenge violet aaye nahi rahe to consume kaha se kare usko?
Executive: Sir kaha ki bylist chahiye aapko bataiye mujhe?
Customer: Haldwani.
Executive: Haldwani. Ha aur?
Customer: Bas Haldwani ki local Haldwani ho gaya. Hmm.
Customer: Haldwani local ka ho gaya Rudrapur ho gaya.
Executive: Rudrapur. Ek minute sir. Ek minute. Search kar lenge. Ha Rudrapur Kichha.
Executive: Aur kya sir?
Customer: Kichha Kichha.
Executive: Aur sir fir se repeat kijiye kya bole aap?
Customer: Kichha ho gaya Kichha.
Executive: Ha Kichha. Ji.
Customer: Ha ha Kichha ho gaya. Hmm. Aur baki aapka.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ye local me isliye baki baad me hum jaise aapka koi local ka kaam aaya.
Executive: Ha ha.
Executive: Sir bas apna local me hi aap deal karoge?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Rudrapur to basically 30 kilometer aage hai Rudrapur ho gaya Kichha ho gaya.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ji. Sir dekhiye na abhi abhi mai check kar pa rahi hu jaise ki 12 din pehle aapke paas lead aayi thi Wooden Cottage Construction Service Nainital se karte ho Haldwani Nainital Uttarakhand.
Customer: Ha ha Nainital bhi kar lenge.
Executive: To sir bylist wale section me ja ke fast jo transaction hota hai usme ja ke aap I am interested mark kar do taaki uski bylist aana aapko start ho jaye.
Customer: Abhi mai dekh raha hu mai abhi thoda mai driving kar raha hu.
Customer: Abhi mai driving kar raha hu abhi aap mujhe baad me dekhunga.
Executive: To sir mujhe major city bata dijiye aap to ye bata dijiye ki bas abhi near by location se deal karenge taaki mai aapko whatsapp pe lead vagaira send karti rahu.
Customer: Ji jyada agar Haldwani ka Rudrapur ka aur Kichha ka chahiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm apna whatsapp number sir bata dijiyega mujhe.
Customer: Whatsapp number 63.
Executive: 63.
Customer: 950.
Executive: 950.
Customer: 22.
Customer: 22.
Customer: 743.
Executive: 743. Sir ek baar confirm kariega 6395022743.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai sir to mai isse aapko bylist vagaira send karti rahungi. Baki sir jo apna product hai isme price vagaira map nahi hote hain kya?
Customer: Ji bhai aawaz aapki saaf nahi aa rahi mai driving kar raha hu to aap aadhe ghante baad baat kar sakte hain.
Executive: Ha ha sir bilkul jo aapki taraf se concern raise hui thi mai usko bhi close karu ye aap mujhe confirmation de dijiye.
Customer: Kya ji?
Executive: Aap ek concern raise kiye the not satisfied ka to sir mai bylist vagaira aapko send kar dungi mai apni taraf se concern close kar du idhar se. Fir hamari aadhe ghante baad baat ho jayegi.
Customer: Ji mai samajh nahi pa raha hu aapki baat aawaz kar rahi hai.
Executive: Sir mujhe ek closer chahiye aapse aapne ek concern raise kiya tha bylist ke regarding to mai concern close kar du idhar se.
Customer: Sir mujhe hamare local ko violet chahiye baki bahar ka close kar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai. Okay sir. Thank you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving local buyleads.

- Wants to close the 'not satisfied' concern.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to send buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Agreed to close the concern for outside locations.

- Executive took customer's WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send buyleads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, local, whatsapp, concern
